name: Brevo
short_description: All-in-one marketing platform with email SMS WhatsApp and automation capabilities.
long_description: Brevo (formerly Sendinblue) is a comprehensive marketing platform that combines email marketing SMS campaigns WhatsApp messaging and marketing automation in one integrated solution. Founded in France in 2012 it offers a freemium model with GDPR-compliant EU hosting.

name: Splio
short_description: Marketing automation and CRM loyalty platform for retail and mid-market.
long_description: Splio is a French marketing automation platform focused on CRM and customer loyalty programs. It specializes in retail and loyalty marketing with strong automation capabilities for customer retention.

name: Actito
short_description: B2C and B2B marketing automation with automated scenarios and CRM marketing.
long_description: Actito is a Belgian marketing automation platform serving both B2C and B2B markets. It offers advanced automated scenarios scoring and CRM marketing capabilities with EU hosting compliance.

name: SAP Emarsys
short_description: Omnichannel automation platform specialized in retail and e-commerce.
long_description: SAP Emarsys is an enterprise-grade omnichannel marketing automation platform specializing in retail and e-commerce. It offers AI-powered recommendations personalization and supports large data volumes.

name: Braze
short_description: Cross-channel marketing platform focused on mobile-first and in-app engagement.
long_description: Braze is a US-based enterprise marketing platform specializing in mobile-first cross-channel engagement. It excels at push notifications in-app messaging and real-time behavioral segmentation.

name: NP6
short_description: Email marketing and CDP platform focused on data marketing and deliverability.
long_description: NP6 is a French email marketing and CDP platform known for excellent deliverability and data marketing expertise. It serves mid-market companies primarily in France.

name: Selligent Marketing Cloud
short_description: Omnichannel marketing platform with unified customer database for B2C and retail.
long_description: Selligent (now Marigold) is a Belgian omnichannel marketing platform offering unified customer database and multi-channel campaign management. It serves mid-market and enterprise B2C companies.

name: Salesforce Marketing Cloud
short_description: Complete enterprise marketing cloud suite with email mobile advertising and personalization.
long_description: Salesforce Marketing Cloud is a comprehensive enterprise marketing suite covering email mobile advertising social and personalization. It integrates natively with Salesforce CRM and offers Einstein AI capabilities.

name: Adobe Campaign
short_description: Cross-channel campaign management with advanced targeting and database management.
long_description: Adobe Campaign (formerly Neolane) is an enterprise campaign management platform offering advanced targeting workflows and database management. It excels at complex cross-channel campaigns for large organizations.

name: Scal-e
short_description: CDP and marketing automation platform for customer data personalization.
long_description: Scal-e is a French CDP and marketing automation platform focused on customer data consolidation and personalized campaign activation. It serves mid-market and enterprise data-driven companies.

name: 1by1
short_description: Personalized 1-to-1 marketing platform with datamart and campaign capabilities.
long_description: 1by1 is a French marketing platform specializing in hyper-personalized one-to-one marketing. It offers datamart capabilities and individual campaign personalization for targeted engagement.

name: Salesforce Pardot
short_description: B2B marketing automation integrated with Salesforce CRM for lead nurturing and scoring.
long_description: Salesforce Pardot (Account Engagement) is a B2B marketing automation platform fully integrated with Salesforce CRM. It offers lead nurturing scoring and Einstein AI capabilities for sales and marketing alignment.

name: HubSpot Marketing Hub
short_description: CRM and all-in-one marketing platform with inbound content and automation.
long_description: HubSpot Marketing Hub is an all-in-one inbound marketing software combining CRM content management and marketing automation. It offers an intuitive interface and comprehensive educational resources.

name: Dolist
short_description: Email marketing and automation platform specialized in deliverability.
long_description: Dolist is a French email marketing platform known for excellent deliverability expertise. It offers basic automation capabilities and personalized support for PME and mid-market companies.

name: Dialog Insight
short_description: Marketing automation and emailing platform for B2C and B2B markets.
long_description: Dialog Insight is a Canadian marketing automation platform serving B2C and B2B markets. It offers bilingual support (French/English) easy segmentation and good value for SMBs.

name: Acoustic Campaign
short_description: Multi-channel marketing automation with IBM Watson heritage.
long_description: Acoustic (formerly IBM Watson Campaign Automation) is a multi-channel marketing platform with Silverpop heritage. It offers solid email marketing and automation capabilities for mid-market and enterprise.

name: Magnews
short_description: Email and automation platform focused on the Italian market.
long_description: Magnews is an Italian email marketing and automation platform adapted to the local market. It offers email SMS and push capabilities with Italian-language support.

name: Blueshift
short_description: SmartHub CDP with omnichannel automation and AI marketing.
long_description: Blueshift is a US CDP and omnichannel automation platform with AI-powered personalization. It offers real-time recommendations scoring and unified customer view for data-driven marketers.

name: ActiveCampaign
short_description: Advanced automation platform with CRM and sales engagement features.
long_description: ActiveCampaign combines email marketing automation and CRM tools with 900+ integrations. It offers powerful visual workflows lead scoring and GPT-powered assistant for SMB and mid-market.

name: ActiveTrail
short_description: Email and SMS marketing platform for SMBs.
long_description: ActiveTrail is an Israeli email and SMS marketing platform offering simple all-in-one capabilities for small businesses. It provides good value with basic automation features.

name: Plezi
short_description: Inbound marketing automation for B2B content and lead generation.
long_description: Plezi is a French inbound marketing automation platform for B2B companies. It focuses on content marketing lead nurturing and scoring with ready-to-use campaign templates.

name: Webmecanik Automation
short_description: Open-source based automation tool built on Mautic.
long_description: Webmecanik is a French marketing automation platform based on Mautic open-source. It offers flexibility transparent pricing and multi-account capabilities ideal for agencies.

name: Act-On
short_description: B2B marketing automation for lead generation and nurturing.
long_description: Act-On is a US B2B marketing automation platform offering comprehensive lead generation nurturing and scoring capabilities. It provides an intuitive interface for non-technical marketers.

name: Mailchimp
short_description: Popular email marketing platform with easy automation and templates.
long_description: Mailchimp (Intuit) is one of the most popular email marketing platforms offering newsletters basic automation and landing pages. Known for its user-friendly interface and generous free tier.

name: Zeta Marketing Platform
short_description: Enterprise data-driven marketing cloud with CDP and omnichannel activation.
long_description: Zeta Global is an enterprise marketing cloud platform offering CDP AI-powered personalization and omnichannel activation. It leverages a vast identity graph for intent marketing.

name: GetResponse
short_description: All-in-one email marketing and automation for SMBs and e-commerce.
long_description: GetResponse is a Polish email marketing platform offering email automation webinars landing pages and e-commerce features. It provides good value with AI email capabilities.

name: Ortto
short_description: Visual automation platform with simplified drag-and-drop workflows.
long_description: Ortto (formerly Autopilot) is an Australian visual marketing automation platform known for its intuitive drag-and-drop workflow builder. It serves startups and growth-focused teams.

name: Benchmark Email
short_description: Simple email marketing for newsletters and autoresponders.
long_description: Benchmark Email is a US email marketing platform focused on simple newsletter sending and basic autoresponders. It offers an accessible interface in multiple languages at attractive pricing.

name: Mapp Cloud
short_description: Digital marketing cloud with email mobile and web analytics.
long_description: Mapp Cloud is a digital marketing platform combining analytics and marketing activation capabilities. It offers email mobile and push marketing with AI enrichment and CDP features.

name: Oracle Responsys
short_description: Enterprise B2C marketing cross-channel platform for large-scale campaigns.
long_description: Oracle Responsys is an enterprise B2C marketing platform within Oracle CX offering cross-channel campaign orchestration at massive scale. It integrates with Oracle Commerce and CX Unity.

name: Oracle Eloqua
short_description: Advanced B2B marketing automation with complex lead scoring and nurturing.
long_description: Oracle Eloqua is an enterprise B2B marketing automation platform offering advanced lead scoring nurturing and account-based marketing. It integrates deeply with CRM systems.

name: Makesbridge
short_description: All-in-one marketing automation with email pages and web tracking.
long_description: Makesbridge is a US all-in-one marketing platform offering email landing pages and web tracking at accessible pricing. It focuses on simplicity and Salesforce integration.

name: SALESmanago
short_description: CDP and marketing automation for e-commerce B2C.
long_description: SALESmanago is a Polish CDP and marketing automation platform focused on e-commerce B2C. It offers cart abandonment recommendations CRM and AI copilot features at competitive pricing.

name: Iterable
short_description: Growth marketing platform for cross-channel mobile and email.
long_description: Iterable is a US growth marketing platform specializing in cross-channel orchestration for mobile and email. It offers flexible workflow builder AI optimization and catalog recommendations.

name: Sendlane
short_description: Email and SMS marketing automation for e-commerce.
long_description: Sendlane is a US email and SMS marketing platform specialized for e-commerce. It offers ready-to-use cart abandonment workflows simple interface and concierge support.

name: Klaviyo
short_description: E-commerce focused marketing automation with deep Shopify integration.
long_description: Klaviyo is a marketing automation platform built specifically for e-commerce brands. It offers powerful email and SMS marketing with advanced segmentation based on real-time customer data.
